description:
For those times you decide to take the unbeaten path. This kit adds an extra layer of padding to your Thule Chariot ensuring a smooth ride for your little one.

  • Extra room for your child’s helmet
  • Easy to install and remove for cleaning
  • Works with Thule Chariot Sport, Thule Chariot Cross and Thule Chariot Lite
name: Thule Chariot Padding 1 - Lite/Cross
